subject: Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.’s president, Mark Emmert was on the stand to defend the organization in an antitrust case that alleges it violated the law by refusing to allow players to profit from their images.
